ESRI.Configuration.Name: Centerline Attribute Swapper
ESRI.Configuration.Description: Addin to change the address range attributes of centerlines after flipping the direction
ESRI.Configuration.Author: Elliott Plack
ESRI.Configuration.Company: Baltimore County Office of Information Technology

Button.caption: Swap Centerline Attributes
Button.message: After flipping the centerline direction, this will swap the left/right from/to attributes
